title: Journey into tomorrow
creator_credit: Victorian Railways and Fortune Film Productions
brief_description: The story of the duplication and electrification of the Gippsland line to Yallourn and Traralgon. Shows its effect on the communities that look to the railway to bring them better living, more goods and greater service, and to take their products swiftly to market.
description: The story of the duplication and electrification of the Gippsland line to Yallourn and Traralgon. Shows its effect on the communities that look to the railway to bring them better living, more goods and greater service, and to take their products swiftly to market.
